website_summaries.verdict: An adorable option that provides high quality support in the bust and waist area.
pros: Available in multiple patterns and colors
High-waisted bottoms have ruching, perfect for tummy control
Underwire provides great support for those with a larger chest
cons: Bathing suit tops run a little large

customer_reviews.title: Cute and trendy bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is super cute and is pretty flattering. As a big woman (about 260 lbs at 5’4”) I ordered an XXL. I’m very mid-section heavy and a smaller chest. The bottoms fit perfectly and the top is a little big in the cups (as I said, I’m not blessed in that area). But overall it was definitely worth the money and is so cute on. This is probably the first time I feel good in a bathing suit :) The shipping was faster than expected and came 10 days before the first day of the expected delivery window. Overall I’m very happy with this suit!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 2x and it fits perfect. I'm 245lbs I have very chest heavy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2x and it fits perfect . I'm 245lbs I have very chest heavy and it's fits perfect . I love it can wait to wear it this summer 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Keisha87

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger busts!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bathing suit. I haven’t worn it swimming yet but I plan on updating the review when I do! I am 5’7”, usually a size 16 pants, size XL shirt, and 42DDD bra. Based on reviews I decided to give this suit a try and I’m glad I did! The straps on the shoulders and in the back are adjustable, and the pads are thick and offer great support. I love the bottoms! I do wish they came up a little higher, but I am tall with a long torso so it’s okay. I can’t wait to wear it this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I love this ❤️❤️ Just as described it fits perfectly I got the 2x im 5’5 and 230 lbs it fitsssss PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Deemy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and I completely love the look of it. I have not worn a 2 piece in 6 years so I'm so glad to find something that makes me feel better about my body
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Mckown

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The quality was better than expected. I ordered size (US 12-14) L, I’m 5’4 and weigh about 160 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Don't size uptoo much, this runs pretty true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swim suit on January 18, 2018. Just received it today. It came from China, even though it was a Prime item? Took over a month to arrive. Quality seemed good. But it was way way to big for me. I should have ordered my normal size or just 1 size up. Would like to return it but the return instructions say it is at my own expense. ? Lesson learned: Always read everything carefully ladies, before you hit the "place order" button.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I tried this bathing suit on and I LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to ordering bathing suits off amazon I be nervous due to previous orders. I tried this bathing suit on and I LOVED IT!!! I am 5'3 weighing in at 205 and my bottom size is a 18 so I used the reviews and ordered a 3XL and it fixs PERFECTLY. I cant wait to wear it on my cruise in a few weeks. Im considering getting this same suit just in a different color. Lets just say I would defiantly order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: I am 220 lbs 5'4" and a 40DDD/E in bra size. I ordered a 2xl and it fits great. The top has adjustable straps and the bottoms are comfy. I haven't worn it in the water yet but I love it so far. I have issues feeling confident with my body and I definitely feel cute in this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Rhegan Keller

customer_reviews.title: Over Succeeded my Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I was so indecisive about ordering a high waisted swimsuit but I absolutely love it. I’ve order tons of swimsuits online but this one is definitely one of my favorites. The cups fit perfectly, and usually that doesn’t happen for me. I was very impressed with the quality. I’ve spent years looking for a flag swimsuit but it’s hard to find one in a plus size that looks cute as well. I would never upload a picture of me in a swimsuit but this is the first one I feel confident in. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit fits perfectly. I am normally a size 16/38DDD and I got the XL and it’s a perfect fit. Only reason I took 1 star off is because the top is a little stiff in the cup area and I feel like I’m going to fall out. But if you’re okay showing a lot of bust this won’t bother you. The bottoms are thick material and hold you in well. Love the way the bottoms look. Overall worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: loved
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think a swimsuit could be this amazing. It a took forever to ship, but well worth the wait. I read the other reviews abouts sizes. I normally wear a 14/16 and ordered a 2xl. Its fit, but some spots it was to big. The top straps do adjusts which helps.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoleg421

customer_reviews.title: I like this so much I ended up buying it in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much I ended up buying it in black and pink! It’s comfortable, has adjustable straps that you can tighten but also criss cross! The bottoms are thick and cover well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this suit!! I wore it mostly with a Hilor brand skirt bottom that I bought on amazon, but the included bottoms fit too! I wasn’t sure it’d fit since it is a plus size suit that went down to a large (which is what I ordered) but it did! It’s definitely made for bigger bra sizes but I (size C-ish after kids?) made it work!! Highly recommend if you’re on the fence!!
customer_reviews.author: Anth

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice way better then I thought
customer_reviews.text: Love the swimsuit, it fits well, it is really nice materal and is very nicely made. I am 250lb about 5'4'' 42DD, I normally wear a XL top 2XL bottoms but I got the 3XL, the top is a bit loose but overall I love it. Honestly it covers up the my belly roll and back roll without it lookings weird or anything. I bought this thinking I wouldn't like it and would return it, I mean I'm fat and this is a bikini but damn I love it. I know I don't look like a beauty queen but I feel good in it.
customer_reviews.author: wvbanshee

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful!! I weigh 240 lbs and I ordered an 18-20 and it fits great! Im heavy chested so i didn't expect it to fit up top but everywhere else is great! It's very stretchy and the material is exactly what you'd expect from a bathing suit. And I'm very happy with the shipping time; it came in about 4 days. The ONLY downside to this suit is the length of the legs. I was expecting it to come down further because I keep having to pull it down so my lady bits aren't flying in the wind. Other than that, it's absolutely great. Very sexy, fit well and good quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Ran true to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in the XXL 18-20 because I always expect everything on Amazon to run small. I'm usually a 16 and definitely don't like super tight bathing suits. This was definitely too big and had to be returned so it runs true to size - no need to size up. That being said, I thought it was cute. The bottoms were big but the top was HUGE. The band is not adjustable. I am a 40DD, and it was really big. I had ordered a few suits at the same time and found another that I preferred over this one so I won't be reordering in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: If you have large boobs, this bathing suit is great!
customer_reviews.text: I looove this suit. It fits great, and most importantly fits my boobs! I'm 5'2, 192 lbs and have 38F boobs and I ordered a 2x, and was honestly a little too big. So this is true to size. However I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute- Size 20
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this suit expecting it not to fit right basically like everything else that I order online. This fit really well and I really like the way it looks on me. I'm 5'3 and 250lbs. I usually wear a size 20. Hopefully anyone else with a similar body size would consider ordering this. It's really cute on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: SIZE 18 5’2 I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THE BATHING SUIT MY BOOBS ARE A 38D AND MY BOTTOM IS A SIZE 18. THIS BATHING SUIT US EVERYTHING IT CANE IN 2 DAYS AND I ORDERED THE SIZE FOR 18-20. IF YOU ARE A TWENTY ID ADVISE YOU GO UP A SIZE AS YOU CAN SEE MY MUFFIN TOP. I STILL THINK OTS SEXY AND I FEEL VERY COMFY. BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but top is way too large
customer_reviews.text: I’m 207 lbs with 36DD chest and 52” hips. I decided on the XL after reading extensive reviews. The bottoms were a perfect fit. I absolutely love the high waist . The top on the other hand is a different story! The top half was very large even after using the adjustments provided on the shoulder straps and back (which by the way is such a genius addition). Unfortunately the cups were too big for me. I thought about exchanging for a smaller size but I’ll end up with the opposite problem on the lower half. The color was soooo beautiful against my skin and since I can’t buy the top separately, I’m gonna have to return this lovely swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Kay

customer_reviews.title: I'm an hourglass shape, 175lbs, 38D, similiar ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an hourglass shape, 175lbs, 38D, similiar shape as the models in the pictures. I bought an XL. The bottoms fit perfectly but the tops cups are way too large. You need very large breasts to fill them out. Also arrived late before I needed it to go on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: I just want a bathing suit that fits! 😢
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering the same swimsuit. The first one I order was XXXL was way to big and the second time I order XXL and it was too small. There was not enough support. I had side boob coming out even after adjusting the straps. I am a 40DD so i need support. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Straps Too thin for busty women
customer_reviews.text: Nice, very pretty. Especially for full figured women. Only problem I have is the straps on the top are wayyyyyy too thin for busty women. Those straps should be wider. But nice swim suit Hard to tighten those Lil straps. Bought for my daughter who is busty at Her age. She's 12 and a 38ddd bought a xl. But that top just Keep exposing her. The first 2x one I sent back BC it was too big. Maybe I sludge just got her a large.
customer_reviews.author: Tri

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I ordered a large (L) I' m a size 12 and it fit perfectly. I am a 38D and the top fits well. very nice 2 pcs bathing suit and the color is nice just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: cynaZZam

customer_reviews.title: Very sexy. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically xl in shirts. I'm 38DDD, XL fit really well. Very sexy. The bottoms were big (I'm usually a 10/12). Wish I could have ordered separate sizes for top and bottom. Otherwise I love it ♡♡♡
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The suit came covered in hair with deodorant lines on it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit but its way to big. I ordered from reviews and decided to order one size up which was XXL. I am 5"9 195 and 36c. I love this suit but its really too big. I think an XL would have fit fine. I got the pink and the material is great just like the pictures. I would recommend this but just double check the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Best suit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to wear this swimsuit this summer. I am shocked that a swimsuit this inexpensive is made from very nice materials. Color is true to picture. Definitely not a good swimsuit if you do not have large boobs. I am a 38 double D and there is just a slight bit of gap at the side of the cups. Other than that small issue the fit is excellent. I am 5' 5 and a size 14 and ordered the extra large.
customer_reviews.author: E. marcus

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and flattering for your curves!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit!! Enough coverage that I’m comfortable enough to actually wear a two piece in public...and I get lots of compliments on It too. I’m large busted (38DDD) so I originally ordered a 2XL because I was afraid the top wouldn’t be big enough...boy was I wrong! It swallowed me! I returned It and purchased a XL. The band is still not as tight as I’d like on the tightest adjustment (which isn’t much honestly), but if I went any smaller the cups wouldn’t fit. I feel supported enough in It though. Nice choice for us curvy gals! Side note: Im a size 12, hourglass type figure.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy paz

customer_reviews.title: For the curvy girls!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7 220 with love handles and ordered a 2x. DEFINITELY true to size! I usually wear a 38D so the cups are a bit big for me but the bottoms come up past my belly button. I have never been confident enough to wear a 2 piece but this swimwear has changed my confidence and body image! Can't wait to wear it on my honeymoon.
customer_reviews.author: JMoore4

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, fits great, not well made
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is seriously cute and fits perfectly. The material is a bit cheap feeling. And unfortunately 2 of the the straps, one shoulder and one cross strap came unsewn the first time I tried it on. I didn't struggle to put it on so I'm guessing it's the stitching. I checked the stitching on the other straps and it looks pretty solid so I don't know if it was just those 2 or if this will keep being an issue. I'm attempting to hand sew it and hope it stays but if that's not something you want to take on maybe keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Teller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for large busts!
customer_reviews.text: The top is great! Offers ample support for my 40F chest. Super sexy and can’t believe my fluffy self will be sporting a bikini top. Works great under my other suit for stylish waterpark support, dresses and alone. Amazingly the bottoms fit fine also but so not for me and my style, they looked like granny panties and really needed to be higher waist. Normally a 16/18 and the xxl is a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2boys

customer_reviews.title: sexy bathing suit for bigger girls but CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: I had to order this item twice. I ordered a large for the top and an XL for the bottoms. Very sexy and comfortable for us fluffy girls. Still lets you show off but remain "controlled" and covered at the same time. I am 189 pounds, 5'1", and normally wear a 38-40C bra. Sadly, the strap for the top broke the day I actually wore it out. This made me soooooo sad because it was a very flattering bathing suit that fit well.
customer_reviews.author: RM88

customer_reviews.title: Not for my body type
customer_reviews.text: I carry my weight in my belly, for sure. But looking at the model, I thought maybe the bottoms would be big enough. Nope. I look awful. This style isn’t for me. The bottoms don’t come up as high as I would want- that being said, the product seems well made. The straps around the neck bothered me, but that could just be me. It fit as I expected, size wise. I’m an 18 and I ordered the 2xl for reference. If you’re an 18 but have a flatter stomach, this might work better for you. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Cute bathing suit, sizing just off a bit on top and bottom depending on body type
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XXL and I’m 5’10” 270 with DD breasts. The top looked and felt more like a bra than a swimming suit and didn’t cover much of my boobs or the back fat, which means I would Not be comfortable wearing this in public. The bottoms were too big, so I ended up returning it. It’s cute and it might have been perfect if I got a bigger size for the top and smaller size for the bottom. The quality seemed good and the fabric was kinda stretchy and not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and A VERY Cute Suit!
customer_reviews.text: This swim suit is a GREAT option. The high waist bottoms fit just like you would want and are true to size, but not quite a high enough waist for me. It sat on the lower end of my waistline in the back (baby got back) and I would have preferred it come up just a tad higher. Top is true to size too (I wear a medium top and 36 B/C bra) and the medium fit well. Definitely worth checking out for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: You will have to pay a lot to send this back.
customer_reviews.text: It fit but wasn't at all comfortable or flattering. Okay, this is Amazon. When I went through the motions of returning it, I learned that I would have to pay more than the cost of the suit to return it. The Seller offered me a few dollars and "allowed" me to keep a bathing suit I didn't want. The bottoms look like granny panties. The straps on the top dig into your skin. The cups actually made me sore. You feel the harsh fabric brush against your skin as you walk. No endorsement here. Believe me or take your chances on eating the cost of the set. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Scholar Mama

customer_reviews.title: HUGE cups
customer_reviews.text: This fit actually way nicer than I expected it to. For a plus size two piece I was pleasantly surprised how it looked. I would have kept it except that the cups are HUGE. I'm a size 16, with 38DD bra size and the cups were massive on me; by that I mean I could have fit both breasts in each cup so there was massive gaping. So this is great if you are extremely well endowed, but anything DD or smaller is probably going to not fit right in the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great suit great fit
customer_reviews.text: Hi there. 210lbs, 5’9”, 36DDD this swimsuit fits great! I had read some people saying the bottoms were too large but I did not have that issue. Good quality for the price. Ordered an XXL and it was too large but that was my erring on the side of caution (things are always too small) returned for a refund and repurchased an XL that fits perfectly! Definitely recommend for my thic friends out there
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice plus size bikini
customer_reviews.text: I've found it really hard to find a bikini for me. I'm a size 16 and I weigh 215 lbs. It was actually the first one I thought looked good! The bottom is high enough to cover up rolls and the top has extra length to it so there's enough mid section showing that it looks good and not reaveling all the rolls. I am also very busy. I wear 40F bras and this was super supportive which is a first, but be careful it may reveal way more cleavage than you expext
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for a big girl
customer_reviews.text: Hey y’all I’m 5’1 over 200 n sumthin pounds and this swimsuit is the bomb!!!! I got a 2xl and it fits perfect!! The only thing the chest part was kinda big for my che-ches’s but jus a lil bit. This will be my 1st year wearing a 2 piece and I’m excited!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loleka

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 3x size because of my breast cup size. Two other suits I purchased (not from this seller) were much too small, so I was pleasantly surprised this was just slightly too large. I have adjusted the straps as tightly as I could, but I need to take it in maybe 2mm for a perfect fit. I am so pleased to find a company that adapts to busty females!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Fitzgibbon

customer_reviews.title: Great bottoms, so so top.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful swim suit, great color. LOVE the bottoms but the top is just not flattering. I use the bottoms and one of my own personal tops with it. I would say it did come fast and it is good material but doesn’t have the best fit. I am 5”5 205lbs and I bought An XL I would say the size is accurate to what I normally buy I am a 40D and the top fit normal around the boob and band area. I would have paid the money just for the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Richards

customer_reviews.title: This is for BIG boobied ladies!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute suit. Runs very big in cups. I wear a 16 in most stretchy jeans, I always have to size up in swim suits. I wear a 38D bra. I'm a smaller D cup, so I can sometimes wear a 40 C depending on the bra. I bought the 18-20 XXL. Suit didnt pinch anywear, no muffin top or thigh pudge sticking out. The band fits like a 38-40 and is wide enough to cover any back fat. Perfect, except I could've fit a whole other boob in each cup. The cups are formed, so theres no way I could've pulled it off. I loved it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: If your apple shaped, get it and rock it!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m a 6ft, apple shaped, plus sized woman. This fits me perfectly. When I tell you I look good, honey..... My husband was ready to pounce when he saw me in it. I got the hot pink one and it looks great on my skin. Don’t wait, just get it. Thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Monalise

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: It fit very well. As a plus sized girl, online shopping is torture but I followed the reviews and ordered a 3xl (wanted to make sure it covered my belly, I’m a mom of 6 and it shows lol). The bottoms were perfect, the cups in the top were a little big but probably because I needed a 2xl in the top. Overall, very satisfied! I’m 5’5 and 259 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great support for busty gals, but decent fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the xxl. I am 5’10”, size 14/16 depending on brand, 38H, and two 10 babies belly..... it is impossible to find a perfect fit, but this one was good enough for the price! The top does NOT come down like a midriff as pictured, more of a true bikini top. I also ordered a xxxl in red, and it was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Chesley

customer_reviews.title: Confidence Booster
customer_reviews.text: I typical wear a 14/16 since having my baby 2 years ago. I ordered an XL Needless to say the struggle has been real trying to find a sexy swim suit to go on my cruise that makes me feel confident. I wish I took pictures but I tried this on and felt amazing. It hid all the places I am self conscious about. I wear 40DD and it fit my chest. With these types of tops it never fits my chest. I am so ready for my trip now.
customer_reviews.author: gottaluvnik

customer_reviews.title: To the lady who posted the basketball photo. Thank you! 😂
customer_reviews.text: I saw another reviewer post a photo with a basketball in the cup of this swimsuit top and while I laughed I also was very excited to have possibly found a swim suit that might fit my top half appropriately. Good news. It fit great. The band was a little loose because I’m a 36/38 but that was easily fixed. The important part was that the cups fit. I will say I wish the straps were thicker. i cup breasts are heavy and I had red marks on my shoulders after wearing it but everything stayed in its proper place so overall it was a great, affordable purchase. Also the bottoms fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Watkins

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay...
customer_reviews.text: I would actually give this suit a 3.5, but I left 4 because I’ll actually wear the top. This bathing suit isn’t good quality...at all. The cups feel like cheap, $5 bras from Walmart. I wouldn't even put this in the washing machine. The top also rode up within 2 minutes of me trying it on. I probably won’t wear the bottoms. They’re a little too small, probably because I ate before putting them on, and they’re not as high as I’d like. But that’s just me. I’ll either wear the top with different bottoms, or wear the bottoms and throw on a skirt coverup.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my body type
customer_reviews.text: According to the chart, my hip size was two sizes bigger than my top size. So compromised and I ordered one size bigger than my top and one size smaller than my hips. I was afraid to order two or three sizes smaller than my hips and not have it fit. The top ended up being way to loose and big and the bottoms fit just okay. If the top actually held the girls up, I might have kept it, but the suit was underwhelming and I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so...this is cute, but there are some down sides. Number 1, the quality isn’t amazing, but it is good for the price you pay. Number 2, if you’re bigger at the bottom and smaller at the top, this probably won’t fit you right. I’m a bigger girl, but I’m all around big, bottom and top, and the top was still kind of loose on my chest. Overall, I’m keeping it because of what I paid, and it is cute, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for plus size! So comfty!
customer_reviews.text: I, like every woman, am skeptical about ordering a bathing suit online. BUT HOLY SMOKES THIS IS GREAT! I’m a 38 DDD, 16 pants and 2xl shirt and this fits amazing. I ordered the 2xl just to be safe and it fits amazing! I do have some side boob action, only cause one breast is much larger than the other, but other than that love this!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hall

customer_reviews.title: Used, Worn, and dirty
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my Amazon box the suit was crammed in a clear bag with a broken zipper. The panty liner was dirty and stuck on the outside of the bag. The suit top had deodorant all over it. The suit was very small and did not line up with the size chart. I got a medium ( size 8) and the suit looked like a size 4
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Luviano

customer_reviews.title: Edit: Not Great Suit
customer_reviews.text: Really love this suit! It’s very cute, well made, and is a great fit. I don’t typically wear bikinis, but this suit makes me feel pretty and fashionable but also covered. I ended up ordering one size up which fits great! Edit: After wearing this suit more, I've discovered that it's a HUGE pain to wear doing any kind of activity. It's very cute, but the top continuously rolls up, the bottoms slide down, and the back of the top straps will NOT adjust to get a better fit. Maybe I just got the wrong size, but I'm disappointed to say the least. It's such a cute suit, but it's not very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Not JUST for plus size
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! I am a size medium top and 8 in bottoms and I bought a large. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit great quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually buy clothing items online since I want to make sure things fit properly and is not cheap . I ordered this with the peace of mind that I could return it under Prime. It was delivered on time and I love everything about this bathing. First time wearing a 2 piece and I felt confident and would love to buy one in every color lol. Great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Cups Stick Out Too Far
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I really really wanted to love this suit. It was the perfect color and exactly my style. I ordered a 2x and the bottoms fit nicely as did the band around the top and the straps. HOWEVER. The boob pads stick out about 3 inches from my actual boobs. And I am a 38C. I thought, “maybe my boobs are too small, maybe it would fit Mom.” My mother is a natural 36G. When she tried on this suit, the same thing happened! There was about a 2 inch gap between her boob and the bathing suit. I was so upset because that is the ONLY thing wrong with this swimsuit. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It fits! I'm surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am completely taken away at how good this swim suit fits! I am 190, 5'3', with a 38H cup size, and a 2XL fit me well. Normally buying swimsuits is a struggle, because of my large cup size BUT this one fits! I love that it has adjustments, which resembles a bra! This helps my boobs stay up. For the price I say it's an excellent deal. This same swim suit at the store would easily be double, I say do it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss College Grad

customer_reviews.title: Loving my swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had bought this swimsuit last year and when I saw it I loved it and knew I had to have one of my own. I am 5’8, 185 pounds, and a 38D bust. I ordered a size Large and it fits perfect. I can never find a swimsuit for my bust size and this one is perfect on me. The color is amazing and the fabric is soft. I may order another one in pink and black.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Summers

customer_reviews.title: Cute but my 38g are spilling out of the side.
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 16 with 38g boobs so i ordered the 2xl. The bottoms fit perfectly but the top at the breast part isnt quite wide enough i have a lot of side boobage going on. I am still going to keep it because ik a 3xl would be too big bottom and possibly too wide at the top. I am also short 4' 11". But it is a very cute and appealing suite even for plus size. Hubs likes it he actually picked it out. And i dont swim anyway just plan too look cute on the beach in Hawaii
customer_reviews.author: MrsAlwaysWright

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5, 180lbs and a 36C. The top is slightly roomy but the adjustable straps help. It is still wearable. I ordered an XL and other than the top being slightly large, i love this bathing suit. It's very flattering and covers all my problem areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms seem true to size.
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms seam true to size but to my amazement (I normally need an 18 top and 14 bottoms so go figure.) the top has plenty of room and absolutely no support the tiny spaghetti straps do nothing and unless you have high full breasts already this is not a flattering suit. Sending it back. The swim suit material is quite good, especially for the price, bottoms are lined, would be great for teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: L C

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly based on size chart
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleasantly surprised by this bathing suit! I got the xl I am top and middle heavy (38DD) 5”9. I just tried it on and it fits PERFECTLY. The bottoms fit perfectly I have no part cutting into me and they’re almost tummy controlling. The top is supportive and I don’t feel like my boobs are going to fall out of it. My options with bathing suits that are comfortable, supportive, and pretty are so limited I will absolutely be buying from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: While I definitely don't have a bikini body (far from it) and I am not at all comfortable with my weight. Something about this swimsuit makes me feel confident and sexy. If someone looks at me, I assume it is because of the awesome and unique swimsuit and not because of my fat.
customer_reviews.author: A_Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit... fits great and the color... wow
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4” and weigh 188. I ordered a large and it fits like a glove. This is my first two piece EVER and it makes me feel amazing! Def worth the buy and the price is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I have wide bottoms and am very flat chested, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wide bottoms and am very flat chested, so bathing suit tops with larger cups never fit correctly. My roommate has a larger chest and a smaller bottom, so she ordered one in her size and we switched the tops!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: I bought a 3xl
customer_reviews.text: A little about myself first: I’m 5 ft 6 in and weigh 225. My bra size is 38D. Just Incase you are like me this info will help. Review: I’m very self conscious about my tummy area. So when I seen this bikini I was oh look I want to try this. So I bought a 3xl and when I received it in the mail I rushed to try it on. Let’s just say in all I love this swimsuit. I fit me perfectly and makes me fell good with my body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Black and Sassy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to the size chart and it fit. I'm expecting and so this worked out well... it is still stretchy and feels good. I'm not heavy chested but if you are you'll be fine because I had room in the top and you can wear the top as a shirt if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Can’t beat this price
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Can’t beat this price! I was not expecting the quality of this suit to be this great. The bottoms hold in my tummy and look amazing, The quality of the bottoms are on par with Torrid bottoms. The top is very well constructed too. I wish you could buy these as separates, because My top and bottom are different sizes. I have a smaller waist and large bust, and this fits better than most underwire tops that are not sized with band and cup measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Remillard

customer_reviews.title: lobve it
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I bought for under my long sleeved rashguard. It was super cute under it. I really liked it. It was super comfy. I wore it all day. I put it under a 1/4 zip rash guard. really liked it. I would wear it alone too I just cant handle the sun that much. And I really llked the little design under it.
customer_reviews.author: alicia anderson

customer_reviews.title: Too flat to fill it out
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit, it's super cute! I am 5'4", 235 and 40c. I ordered the xxl and it fit great EXCEPT for the bust. It has formed cups that look great, but gaped open by my armpits. I tried to see if I could take it in, but it was just too big. If you are bustier than I am, go for it! It's a great suit at a great price
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Boobies: 1; Bathing Suit: 0
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit was cute! Packaged very well, I bought it for my 25th bday (kayaking social distancing partay) but returned it because I’m about 50lbs overweight and this is NOT big boob friendly. Thick fabric, beautiful colors, typical curvy girl problem where the top is too small and the waist is too large and the hips are snug. My body: 40f, 39 inch waist, 45 inch hips.
customer_reviews.author: Blash

customer_reviews.title: Best Suit I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I was looking up bathing suits due to the upcoming summer season. I purchased this after looking at some outrageous priced ones at the mall. I was worried that I would it would not fit right or would look awful when It got here. This is the first bathing suit in forever that I love on me and feels secure and I wont be popping out in places. I am so happy with my purchase and have already recommended it to family. I am 5' 3", around 190, and a ddd cup. I ot the x-large and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: One size change was a huge jump
customer_reviews.text: The xxxl was can comically massive on me, even going on their sizing for my fit. I only filled half of the volume of the cups for the top. I returned it for a xxl. One size down was incredibly small! I was spilling out of the top and the bottom hem wasn’t as low was the photo. It just looked like a standard bikini top instead of a longer vintage style one. Too bad the difference between sizing is so drastic, it would have looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Odd Fit but CUTE
customer_reviews.text: It’s not for every shape. The bottoms fit my hips, and the top fits but even though I have a large bust, the top is clearly for someone with a G cup, not a D. It just sticks straight out and the cups could be filled with water balloons, or you can leave them empty to catch foos when you eat. Too bad super cute suit. Worth keeping for the high waisted bottoms!
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.text: i’m really satisfied with my order!! it fit perfect!!! i’m a 2x and i was scared that i was going to need a 3x, but i read the reviews and they said it fit perfect, so i bought a 2x. i was really happy that it actually fit me! was a tad small on the cup size but that’s because i’m a DDD cup size, it wasn’t tight though! it compliments my body well too and it didn’t make me super insecure!
customer_reviews.author: Jennah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beware Busty Girls
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews says this is great for busty girls. That might be true to an extent (the cups seem larger than standard) but not for the very busty. The cups are molded and did not fit me. I am a 40G/H depending on brand. The band was perfect (and adjustable) as were the straps and it would have been really cute but the cups were like 2ish sizes too small. The bottoms fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I am a size DD38, and this bathing suit looked great, and I love wearing it... however, when the wire started stabbing me, it made me a little sad and uncomfortable. It wasn't my only bathing suit on my trip, so I took a chance and took out the wire on both sides, and it still worked and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Frococo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 16/18 and bought the XXL and it fit great! Love love love this suit I want one in every color. It’s not great for high activity swimming for me because of how large my boobs are and how much strappy area there is but it’s so cute! I wore it as a top with green beach pants at our cruise port and ofcourse as just a swimsuit at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouss

customer_reviews.title: The appearance is beautiful and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this suit a 5 star but I can’t. The appearance is beautiful and I love the color. But sadly the top is to big. I followed the sizing chart for around the bust size. It all fits there but the cup size in a xxl looks as if it is a triple d or a double d. I am a larger girl being 249 but my chest is smaller. Would love to exchange sizes but cant find anywhere to message sender.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Reed

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and stylish
customer_reviews.text: The fit of this 2 piece was exactly as expected. I am only 5'2" And about 160lb. I wear a 38DDD and the top felt sturdy enough to support me. I bought a XL. Usually wear 12/14 and after reading reviews I decided on XL(us 14/16) and I am glad I did. Thinking of buying another color. The reason I only gave 4 stars is that I still haven't used it in water.
customer_reviews.author: Pia Tomcho

customer_reviews.title: Definitely feels like an outfit from china the top straps would not ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely feels like an outfit from china the top straps would not stay connected they kept popping off while in the pool just sitting still. Overall loved the color and design. Wished this was of better quality
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Cute,  order down a size
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but too big. I'm 5'7", 189 lbs and dropping. 38C top. I got an xl as I currently wear a 14/16 pants. The bottoms were doable but were a little looser than I would like. The top was way too big. I'm hoping a large will fit better, returning and will try again.
customer_reviews.author: ShellBell

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: The bathing suit arrived damaged. The section of the bathing suit where the underwire meets in the middle of the chest was frayed. There were black marks on the suit from the metal strap adjustments. The sizing was confusing. I used the size chart to prior to ordering. Based on the chart I ordered a 3XL, since I am 40DDD and wear 12/14. However the sticker on the packaged received said 3XL but the actual tags on the suit said 2XL. The underbust was too large and the cup size was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Nice color not a great fit up top
customer_reviews.text: I’m curvy, 5’7”-220lbs with a 14-16 waist. Bra size 38DDD and very active! It’s tough for me to find something that fits and I’m always looking for a very supportive baithing suit top and control waist. I Ordered the XL and love the pink color of this suit! The bottoms fit perfect and slim the waist well however the top doesn’t have large enough cups for my breasts. I fear if I get a bigger suit that the bottoms will be too big and the top will also be too big with larger cups but not fit around my rib cage tight enough. Ending thoughts, not a good top for busty gals with smaller rib cages.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Accentuates Comfy Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have so buy it. This swimsuit is as pictured and accentuates curves. Overjoyed with this find. Glad I came across it. I love that this is not overly revealing. Wish it came in more colors...such as neon green or neon orange.
customer_reviews.author: Tenacity Best

customer_reviews.title: Not good for larger busts
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be very small at the top. I am a usually 16/XL in tops and bottoms with bigger busts (bra size 38/40 F). This was very constructive for me. I was overflowing. I also wanted the bottoms to be higher and they did not come over my belly button. I have a normal sized torso. Outside of this it was made nicely and was pretty. Just not for me. I did return it. My refund is “on the way”.
customer_reviews.author: MRS. DEVOR

customer_reviews.title: IM INLOVE , so flattering!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only bathing suit I’ve felt confident in in years. I’m 5’1, no boobs, no butt, 170lbs and this bathing suit looks BOMB on me. My bf was google-y eyes. I did not expect to like it since that’s how all of my swimsuit try ons go but I’m in love and can’t wait to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: hali

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can cross the straps in the back. This helps with support along with the underwire. I'd like a little more material in the underarm/side boob area but it's not gonna stop me from wearing it! Overall fits as described.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Great Swim Suit
customer_reviews.text: I recently lost a lot of weight so I didnt know what size to go with exactly but I got an XL. And it fits great.. It’s a little big in the bust but that’s my fault lol it keeps it shape in the wash. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Domenxca_Nxcole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am a curvy women and this bathing suit fits me perfect six XXL. I love the adjustable straps, the color and fit. recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Purchase

customer_reviews.title: The Cups Fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cups on this bathing suit work if your chest is wide-set, high set, and/or large. I have a difficult time finding a bathing suit that fits my body perfectly but this one did and really shows off my figure. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT suit for curvy girls!
customer_reviews.text: Fav bathing suit ever! Fit great made very well the color was perfect. Amazing two piece for curvy busty girls I am 40DDD and it fit perfect. I am going to order in more colors loooved the hot pink and I got so many compliments on my cruise!
customer_reviews.author: B. Beech

customer_reviews.title: Finally bold enough for a 2 piece
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this swim suit. I have never been confident enough to wear a two piece even when I was a size 4. I decided to be bold this year for my birthday and I am in love. I typically wear a size 16 in pants, 14 in dresses. I'm 5'5 and 220 pounds. I ordered the XL and it fit amazingly. I don't feel like a fat girl at all and even dare to wear without a cover. The only reason I didn't give five stars is that the red looks more like a rusty orange. That was disappointing but because it still looks good on my skin I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This swimsuit is a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is a must buy! It flatters your curves even if you’re a little round in the middle
customer_reviews.author: S. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit but order a size smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great on a plus sized woman; however, unless you are larger than a D cup, the top will be too big. I ordered in two different sizes to try to get a perfect fit, but it runs big. I still like it though because even though the top is a little loose, it looks great on and the looseness isn’t very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: sillysongbird

customer_reviews.title: Solid Suit
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this suit! If you are solidly a 16 you'll find this a great fit. As with most suits though, this one is made for a lady with a smaller chest, and with G cups, it was definitely small up there for me, but ok for lounging. Wouldn't want to do watersports in this kind of suit, but it's nice for laying out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Good top for the inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: This isn't an expensive suit so I wasn't expecting beautiful craftsmanship, and there are some unfinished threads. I've only worn it twice but so far I think it's extremely flattering and very supportive. I'm 5'1, a size 18 or so, and a true 40 GGish and I like how longline the top is (I honestly wasn't planning on wearing the bottoms, which I don't like as much, because I already have black bottoms I do like). It doesn't dig and it's got great coverage, and I think it's really cute. Again - it's not pure craftsmanship. But I'm pleasantly surprised at how much I like the top.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

product_meta.title: Dearlove Women's Plus Size Bathing Suit Strappy High Waist Bikini Swimsuit M-XXXL
feature_bullets: Chic design--bikini top with crossed strappy detail and adjustable straps
Great Support--underwire,soft bra paddings for a push-up effect. Please choose one size up.
Moderate Coverage--ruched high waisted bikini bottoms for tummy control
Enjoy your summer beach, party, vacation with this flattering swimsuit
Package Includes: 1 x Bikini set(top & bottom)
